description:
This printer driver is a software that controls KONICA MINOLTA Multi Function Printer.
This is required to print with KONICA MINOLTA Multi Function Printer from your PC.

#### Package Parameters
The following package parameters can be set:

 * `/FAX:` - Install FAX x86/x64 driver
 * `/PCL:` - Install PLC6 x86/x64 driver
 * `/PS:` - Install PS x86/x64 driver
 * If no parameter is given all drivers in the package will be installed.

To pass parameters, use `--params "''"` (e.g. `choco install kmupd --params="'/FAX /PCL /PS'"`).
To have choco remember parameters on upgrade, be sure to set `choco feature enable -n=useRememberedArgumentsForUpgrades`.
displayName: KONICA MINOLTA Universal Print Driver PCL/PS/FAX
summary: KONICA MINOLTA Universal Print Driver PCL/PS/FAX
author: Konica Minolta
